product_name: Roxy Classic Board Shorts - Women's - 2" Inseam
long_description: The no-frills Roxy Classic Board Shorts for women with 2 in. inseam will have you heading straight for the water in simple, time-honored board short style. Soft, durable polyester sheds water quickly for all-day comfort in and around the water; spandex offers 4-way stretch. Wide waistband with drawstring offers a comfortable fit. Hand wash the Roxy Classic board shorts in cold water. Back welt pocket; Roxy logo detail.
short_description: The no-frills Roxy Classic Board Shorts for women with 2 in. inseam will have you heading straight for the water in simple, time-honored board short style.
